summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BACKGRND editorial website - all backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly
passed_tests: Backend API: GET /api/config returns site configuration (200)
Backend API: GET /api/essays returns list of 5 essays (200)
Backend API: GET /api/essays/recent?limit=3 returns 3 recent essays (200)
Backend API: GET /api/essays/{slug} returns single essay with body (200)
Backend API: GET /api/about returns about page content (200)
Backend API: 404 handling for non-existent essays (404)
Frontend Homepage loads and displays site config and recent essays
Frontend Essays page displays all 5 essays correctly
Frontend Essay detail page loads individual essays with full content
Frontend About page displays structured content and contact email
Navigation between all pages works correctly
Error handling displays 404 page for non-existent essays
Loading states display briefly during data fetching
Header navigation links (Essays, About, Home) all functional
Essay links from homepage and essays page work correctly
Back navigation from essay detail pages works
View all essays link from homepage works
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (6/6 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all UI flows working)
